title: A+ Notes: Free Notepad
summary: A+ Notes is an intuitive, powerful notepad application. Android Wear supported
description: A+ Notes lets you create, edit and save notes. A+ Notes gives you a quick and easy note taking experience. It's not only simple and easy to use but also comes with many features: -Send notes to Android Wear-Copy, paste and edit entries-Customizable background and font(bold,underline,font color)-Insert pictures from camera and gallery-Share and sort-Folders to group notes-Maths symbols -Transferable to external storage(sd card)-Option for hiding toolbar for simple UI experience
descriptionHTML:
A+ Notes lets you create, edit and save notes. A+ Notes gives you a quick and easy note taking experience. It's not only simple and easy to use but also comes with many features:

-Send notes to Android Wear
-Copy, paste and edit entries
-Customizable background and font(bold,underline,font color)
-Insert pictures from camera and gallery
-Share and sort
-Folders to group notes
-Maths symbols
-Transferable to external storage(sd card)
-Option for hiding toolbar for simple UI experience
comments: Nice application. Well thought, simple and effective. If you want to improve, do the following improvements.  That red button on left down corner, does not fit with the application. I suggest you make it either green or blue. You can also add a feature in setting, so user can choose the colour he wishes for this button. Also make possible to change folder colours, so that user can choose a colour for any folder from a colour palette that you will create. Five rating if you will make these changes, since then program much more professional. Good luck.
need black in wear need black background in wear
Please Black background on wear and it's a 5 star app
Neat Life just got made easier with the A+ notes,
Easy It's so easy to organize notes using this app.
Easy access It's hands on and so easy to manage and follow
